pr_title: [YouTube] Use Integer operations in parseDurationString method

timeline.message:
Added a comment

and fixed a "typo" in the method parseDurationString replacing Long with Integer.

These are not the droids you are looking for wb9688 :grin:

timeline.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText: final at this place is actually enforced by our Checkstyle rules, though obviously I haven't made the PR for using Checkstyle on NewPipeExtractor yet.
